name: bulbasaur
summary: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

name: ivysaur
summary: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: venusaur
summary: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: charmander
summary: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: charmeleon
summary: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: charizard
summary: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: wartortle
summary: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: blastoise
summary: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

name: caterpie
summary: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: metapod
summary: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: butterfree
summary: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: weedle
summary: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

name: kakuna
summary: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

name: pidgey
summary: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: pidgeotto
summary: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: pidgeot
summary: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

name: rattata
summary: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: raticate
summary: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

name: spearow
summary: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

name: fearow
summary: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: arbok
summary: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

name: pikachu
summary: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

name: raichu
summary: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

name: sandshrew
summary: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: sandslash
summary: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: nidoran-f
summary: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: nidorina
summary: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

name: nidoran-m
summary: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

name: nidorino
summary: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: nidoking
summary: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

name: clefairy
summary: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

name: clefable
summary: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: vulpix
summary: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: ninetales
summary: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

name: wigglytuff
summary: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: zubat
summary: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: golbat
summary: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: oddish
summary: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: gloom
summary: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

name: vileplume
summary: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

name: paras
summary: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

name: venonat
summary: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

name: venomoth
summary: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: diglett
summary: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: dugtrio
summary: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: meowth
summary: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.

name: persian
summary: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: psyduck
summary: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

name: mankey
summary: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: primeape
summary: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

name: growlithe
summary: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

name: arcanine
summary: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: poliwag
summary: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

name: poliwhirl
summary: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: poliwrath
summary: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: kadabra
summary: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

name: alakazam
summary: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

name: machop
summary: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

name: machoke
summary: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: machamp
summary: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

name: bellsprout
summary: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

name: weepinbell
summary: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

name: tentacool
summary: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

name: tentacruel
summary: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: geodude
summary: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: graveler
summary: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

name: golem
summary: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

name: ponyta
summary: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: rapidash
summary: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: slowbro
summary: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

name: magnemite
summary: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

name: magneton
summary: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: farfetchd
summary: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

name: doduo
summary: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

name: dodrio
summary: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

name: seel
summary: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

name: grimer
summary: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: muk
summary: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: shellder
summary: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: cloyster
summary: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

name: gastly
summary: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: haunter
summary: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

name: gengar
summary: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: onix
summary: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.
